title: Project Draco Launch
description: The official launch of Draco: Autonomous Cloud Governance. This release establishes the core infrastructure, AI sentinel logic, and the central governance web portal.

items.title: Unified Configuration System
items.description: Implemented a robust, hierarchical configuration system.
details: Full .env file support for secret management
Environment variable overrides for production parity
Hierarchical structure for Twilio, SendGrid, and Gemini keys

items.title: Self-Hosted Persistence
items.description: Secure database architecture using Neon and PostgreSQL.
details: Vector-enabled database schema for AI context storage
Entity Framework Core integration with Npgsql
Privacy-first local processing for anomaly detection

items.title: Astro Documentation Engine
items.description: A high-performance hub for project resources and legal policies.
details: Server-Side Rendering (SSR) for dynamic database fetching
L-Drago Design System with Obsidian Black and Pure Spirit White themes

items.title: Gemini AI Core
items.description: Automated reasoning for cloud infrastructure anomalies.
details: Natural language analysis of cloud resource snapshots
Automated Terraform HCL generation for remediations
Privacy redaction for PII before AI processing

items.title: Multi-Channel Alerts
items.description: Real-time notifications via Twilio and SendGrid.
details: Interactive SMS approvals for automated fixes
Detailed email reports for governance compliance
Natural language alert translation via Gemini
